* Improvements
- Reduced network usage and power consumption
- Redesigned permission request process
- Added and adjusted filters
- Supports iPhone X

* Fixed Other Bugs

* New features
- We have an exclusive app icon for our VIP members.

* Updates on existing features
- You can cancel your nickname change request when you are a VIP member.

* Additional notes
- We fixed a few bugs and made improvements on efficiency.
- We are no longer supporting iOS8 to focus on latest updates.

Check out the new Azar!
We have made tons of upgrades this time!
Less Tabs, improved Filter effects. Check out the details below :

Message
- Friends tab integrated with Messages tab
- Show your friend's online status

Filter
- Try out our latest beauty filter!

-NEW FEATURES-
Turn your world on and create your own style!
We are adding a brand new feature called â€˜AzarMe - a fully customizable AR avatarâ€™ in Azar.
With this feature, you can engage more comfortably with no pressure of face-to-face chats and have fun by decorating your character.
*The toggles in the mirror and match screens will let you switch this mode ON/OFF
*You can select your AzarMeâ€™s hair style/face/body/top/background in the studio
*AzarMe will follow your facial expressions and movement, with human-like graphics
*Please note that this service is currently only available on iPhone X and later devices
